overview: Welcome to JB Serene Villas, a double layered gated(community within a gated community) with 42 acres of premium gated community within 570 aces of gated community with 90 villas, 20000 square feet clubhouse which is the state of art with all world class amenities.
valuesproject: Location: Ibrahimpatnam on Sagar Road, adjacent Guru Nanak Institutions.
Beautiful entrance with separate entry and exit gates
